description:
Luffy, Zoro, and Nami are sent hurtling toward their deaths by the villains of CP9! Meanwhile, Usopp forges an unlikely friendship with Franky while waiting out a storm.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il CP9 in cerca di Franky
L’équipage au chapeau de paille décimé ? La menace du modèle Léopard
Mugiwara Kaizoku Dan Zenmetsu? Model Leopard no Kyoui
The Straw Hat Pirates Annihilated? The Menace of the Leopard Model!
القضاء على قراصنة قبّعة القشّ؟ تهديد صنف النّمر المرقّط!
麦わら海賊団全滅? モデル豹[レオパルド]の脅威!
